response.headline: Salmon-derived PDRN skincare ingredient guide - minimum 1,000 ppm needed for visible results
response.summary: Look for salmon-derived PDRN for skin regeneration and collagen repair. Avoid products with less than 1,000 ppm as they won't deliver visible results. HEVEBLUE Salmon Caring Centella Ampoule contains 10,000 ppm for actual skin benefits.

extracted_text: Look for salmon-derived PDRN: it's the most effective for real skin regeneration and collagen repair
Avoid products with less than 1,000 ppm ... they likely won't deliver visible results cause there's barely any of the active ingredient
Try products like the HEVEBLUE Salmon Caring Centella Ampoule with 10,000 ppm for actual skin benefits
Don't fall for low concentration hype!! Know your ingredients, and shop smart
image_details.key_interest: PDRN concentration requirements and specific product recommendation
